column5: So here's the deal, I have a  12ft. fibreglass boat that I want to give away. It needs a good wash/paint and has a small crack that needs repair. (easy fix) I have no trailer for it, so you must have a way to transport it outta here. A pickup, full size van or roof racks would do. It weights less 100lbs and is great for small lakes with a trolling motor on the back. I live in Scarborough, Markham and 401 area. PM if you are interested.
Ill take it for sure! That would be a fun project for me....
if you still need a home for it let me know iam in the scarborough area with pick up truck

Hey Ben,  Seeing how you were the first to respond, I will contacting you via PM.  DustinK,  Thank you, just trying to give back a little something to the members.  Malcolm and Rico,  Thanks for the response, if things don't work out for Ben, Malcolm's next then Rico.
again - good on ya "Lonschild" - we can't all aford to buy a boat!!!!  uf
